docs.title: MORI Field Survey Report
docs.text:
MORI Field Survey Report is an archive designed to integrate and publish the results of field surveys conducted under Project MORI, the JICA–IBAMA technical cooperation initiative.

This website provides a structured, map-linked collection of field observations to support forest monitoring and enforcement against illegal deforestation in the Brazilian Amazon. Each survey entry follows a standardized format, including:

  • Survey location (GeoJSON / map integration)
  • Background and objectives
  • Field observations and photographs
  • Satellite imagery and AI-assisted analysis
  • Key findings and insights

The purpose of this archive is to enhance transparency, improve decision-making support for field operations, and strengthen information sharing among government agencies, researchers, and project stakeholders.

We hope that these efforts contribute to a more sustainable future for the Amazon region.

docs.title: Project Overview
docs.text:
This website is part of "Project for improving control of illegal deforestation through advanced SAR and AI technologies in the Brazilian Amazon", Project MORI, a JICA technical cooperation project implemented jointly with IBAMA and other partner institutions in Brazil.

Project MORI https://github.com/Project-MORI

ODA Project Site https://www.jica.go.jp/oda/project/1900371/index.html

The project aims to strengthen environmental monitoring and enforcement capacity through the integration of satellite remote sensing using SAR, AI-based deforestation prediction, and field-survey data.

docs.title: Data Sources and Attribution
docs.text: This MORI Field Survey Report uses multiple open and institutional datasets. All datasets are credited to their original providers. Users referencing this website or derived products should ensure proper citation of each dataset as required by the respective provider.

docs.title: ALOS-2 (PALSAR-2) – JAXA
docs.text:
• Provider: Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA)
  • Official site: https://www.eorc.jaxa.jp/ALOS-2/en/
  • Notes: Data used under JAXA’s permitted research frameworks.

docs.title: JJ-FAST – JICA / JAXA
docs.text:
• Providers: Japan International Cooperation Agency (JICA) & JAXA
  • Official site: https://www.eorc.jaxa.jp/jjfast/
  • Notes: Deforestation early-warning system jointly developed by JICA and JAXA.

docs.title: DETER – INPE
docs.text:
• Provider: Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas Espaciais (INPE)
  • Official site: https://terrabrasilis.dpi.inpe.br/
  • Notes: Near real-time deforestation detection; public open data. (CC BY-SA 4.0)

docs.title: PRODES – INPE
docs.text:
• Provider: INPE
  • Official site: https://terrabrasilis.dpi.inpe.br/
  • Notes: Annual official deforestation statistics for the Brazilian Amazon. (CC BY-SA 4.0)

docs.title: NASA FIRMS – Fire Information for Resource Management System
docs.text:
• Provider: NASA / NOAA
  • Official site: https://firms.modaps.eosdis.nasa.gov/
  • Notes: Active fire alerts from MODIS and VIIRS satellites.

docs.title: Embargo Dataset – IBAMA
docs.text:
• Provider: Instituto Brasileiro do Meio Ambiente e dos Recursos Naturais Renováveis (IBAMA)
  • Official site: https://dados.gov.br/dataset/areas-embargadas
  • Notes: Administrative embargo areas; publicly available.

docs.title: Sentinel-2 (for NDVI) – ESA Copernicus Program
docs.text:
• Provider: European Space Agency (ESA)
  • Copernicus Open Access Hub: https://dataspace.copernicus.eu/
  • Contains modified Copernicus Sentinel-2 data (ESA, 2015-2025)
  • Notes: Data used under the Copernicus license.

docs.title: Landsat (for NDVI) - USGS and NASA
docs.text:
• Provider: USGS (United States Geological Survey) and NASA
  • USGS Landsat Missions: https://www.usgs.gov/landsat-missions
  • Landsat data courtesy of the U.S. Geological Survey.
  • Notes: Data used Landsat Open Data Policy

docs.title: Planet NICFI Basemaps and daily imaginary – Planet Labs PBC
docs.text:
• Provider: Planet Labs under the NICFI (Norway’s International Climate and Forest Initiative) program
  • Official site: https://www.planet.com/nicfi/
  • Notes: High-resolution monthly basemaps used for visual interpretation.

docs.title: Use of This Data
docs.text:
Unless otherwise stated, analysis results, derived data, and visualizations on this site should be cited as:

Project-MORI (JICA/IBAMA)

When using source data from JAXA, JICA, INPE, ESA, NASA, IBAMA, or Planet/NICFI, please follow each provider’s individual attribution requirements.

docs.title: Suggested Citation for This Website
docs.text: Project MORI JICA / IBAMA Technical Cooperation Project. https://project-mori.github.io/
